meanings.definition: To tell again or in a different way.
meanings.sent1: She retellings the story to her friend.
meanings.sent2: He often retellings his favorite childhood tales.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they retellings the silly jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled as she retellings the magical adventure.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's voice echoed as she retellings the historical events.

meanings.definition: The act of telling a story again or differently.
meanings.sent1: The retellings of the legend fascinated the audience.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading different retellings of fairy tales.
meanings.sent3: The retellings of the mystery novel kept changing.
meanings.sent4: His retellings of the ancient myths were captivating.
meanings.sent5: The retellings of the folklore added new depth to the stories.
